com.lift.game.controller.powerups.types

Class TimedPowerUp

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.lift.game.controller.entities.EntityBody

        • com.lift.game.controller.powerups.types.TimedPowerUp
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PowerUp
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    VelocityPU

    public abstract class TimedPowerUp
extends BasicPowerUP
implements PowerUp
    Implements the based class for a power up which is active.

                    EntityModel model,

        Constructs a timed power up with a given time to disappear and an active time.
        Parameters:
        model - Model the power up is based on.
        world - World the power is in.
        timeToDisappear - Time before the power up disappears.
        activeTime - Time the power up will be active.
